name: cj-automation-tests
description: Automation tests for Care Journey using Cypress+Cucumber

scripts.Run:multipleNPI:prod: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@multipleNPISearch and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/NPI/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:dev:explorer: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:tst:explorer: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=TST,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:int:explorer: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=INT,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:prod:explorer: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:dev:explorer: cypress run --browser chrome --e2e -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:tst:explorer: cypress run --browser chrome --e2e -e ENV=TST,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:int:explorer: cypress run --browser chrome --e2e -e ENV=INT,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:prod:explorer: cypress run --browser chrome --e2e -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Explorer/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:dev:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:tst:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=TST,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:int:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=INT,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:prod:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:dev:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:tst:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=TST,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:int:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=INT,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:prod:reports: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/MyReports/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:dev:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:tst:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=TST,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:int:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=INT,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:smoke:prod:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@smoke and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:dev:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:tst:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=TST,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature --output jsonlogs/log.json
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:int:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=INT,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:prod:cohort: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PROD,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/Cohort/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:dev:tableau: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=DEV,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/ProviderPerformance/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:tst:tableau: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=TST,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/ProviderPerformance/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:int:tableau: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=INT,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/ProviderPerformance/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress:run:regressions:prod:tableau: cypress run --e2e --browser chrome -e ENV=PRDO,"tags=@regression and not @ignore" -s cypress/e2e/features/ProviderPerformance/**/*.feature
scripts.cypress: npm run delete:reports && npm run test && npm run "generate:report"
scripts.cy:run: cypress run --parallel --record --key 0ee41a71-6aad-427b-8c5b-275a43c309e8 --group 'Cypress tests' --spec 'cypress/e2e/features/**/*.feature' --env tags='<< pipeline.parameters.cypress_tags >> and not @ignore',ENV='<< pipeline.parameters.environment >>'

author: Darwoft
